contents.name: welcome
contents.contents: Welcome to my website. You can use this terminal to learn more about me and my current projects. If you don't have any experience using a computer terminal, simply type 'help' to learn how to navigate through mine.

contents.name: about
contents.contents:
My name is Sebastian.

I'm currently a Software Engineer at
Qualcomm, San Diego

I graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science at the
University of California, San Diego.

contents.name: DiscordBot
contents.description: A simple Discord Bot written in C# using the Discord.Net API. Features include a minimal UI, chat management, audio playback, automatic playlist management, multitasking and multithreading.

contents.name: Rendering
contents.description: This rendered picture is the result of a final project for an advanced computer graphics course. It utilizes different graphical techniques, particularly in ray and path tracing.

contents.name: OpenGL
contents.description: After taking a Computer Graphics course, I wanted to dive more into the OpenGL concepts I learned towards the end of the class. This application replicates water using Frame Buffer Objects for both reflection and refraction, clipping planes, and DU/DV maps to create a wavy effect. Currently, I'm working on making this more realistic to mimic the basic properties of water.

contents.name: ComputerGraphics
contents.description: The Island is a final project for CSE167: Computer Graphics, using openGL and C++. This project attempts to summarize concepts learned in the course throughout the quarter and implement advanced computer graphics concepts. Some concepts were cut to meet deadlines, so some parts of the final project were not fully implemented as planned.

contents.name: More
contents.description: More to come on my Github.
